description:
Ferio is a warrior whom the Magic Knights first meet in the Forest of Silence.
A tough young man wielding a sword taller than he is, he quickly develops a soft spot for Fuu, which by the second season has evolved into love.
Never completely honest with others, he made himself difficult for our heroines to trust.
In the anime he gives Fuu a orb and uses it to communicate with her throughout the first series. Fuu loses it when the three go home to Tokyo in the first series, but in the second series, when they return, he gives it to her for a second time.
name: Ferio
